entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 06:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 5

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
